articles.author: Andrew Gregory
articles.title: New technique could help diagnose Parkinson’s early, scientists say - The Guardian
articles.description: US researchers say they have found method that could pinpoint disease before symptoms show, allowing earlier treatment
articles.content:
Scientists have developed a new technique that could help diagnose Parkinsons disease before symptoms show, and speed up the hunt for a cure.
